Package com.authenticket.authenticket.service.impl

Class SectionServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.authenticket.authenticket.service.impl.SectionServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
SectionService
@Service public class SectionServiceImpl extends Object implements SectionService
This class provides the implementation of the `SectionService` interface, which manages event sections and seat assignments.

    • getCurrentSeatMatrix

      public int[][] getCurrentSeatMatrix(Event event, Section section)
      Get the current seat matrix for a specific event and section.
      Specified by:
      getCurrentSeatMatrix in interface SectionService
      Parameters:
      event - The event for which to get the seat matrix.
      section - The section for which to get the seat matrix.
      Returns:
      A two-dimensional array representing the seat matrix where 0 indicates an unoccupied seat and 1 indicates an occupied seat.

    • findSectionDetail

      public List<SectionTicketDetailsDto> findSectionDetail(Event event, Section section)
      Find section ticket details for a specific event and section.
      Specified by:
      findSectionDetail in interface SectionService
      Parameters:
      event - The event for which to retrieve section ticket details.
      section - The section for which to retrieve ticket details.
      Returns:
      A list of `SectionTicketDetailsDto` containing ticket details for the given event and section.
